article_title: UN's top court to rule on Israel in Gaza war
sentence: More  than  25,000  Palestinians  -  mostly  women  and  children  -  have  been  killed  and  tens  of  thousands  injured,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza,  since  Israel  began  its  offensive,  triggered  by  an  unprecedented  attack  on  Israel  by  the  group.

article_title: UN's top court to rule on Israel in Gaza war
sentence: The  Hamas  attack  on  7  October  killed  about  1,200  people,  mainly  civilians.

article_title: UN's top court to rule on Israel in Gaza war
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: UN's top court to rule on Israel in Gaza war
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
